channel.title: Red Army Choir
channel.description:
Heck, this is some great music. I'm not a huge fan of the political system in the former Soviet Union, but they've done some magnificent things. Choirs is one of them: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JBPyx2U3Ll0
